jd: From: Anju Pathak, Tek Inspirations LLC anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com Reply to: anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Technical Business AnalystLocation: Tampa, FLWork Setup: Hybrid setup (we prefer local candidates, but relocating candidates are accepted)Number of Openings: 4Required Years of Relevant Professional Experience: At least 12 years of professional experienceNeed banking and finance experience. around 6-7 yearsRequired Skillsets:Must have at least 12 years of professional experience using the below skills:There will only be 1 to 2 interviewsAt least 12 years of experience working as a Technical Business AnalystExcellent in Agile methodologies and practicesExcellent in JIRA/ConfluenceExperience with SWIFT or ISO20022 (at least 3 to 4 years)Strong Experience working with a payment/online banking related software project/applicationStrong experience working at the banking services companyGreat communication skills
